You can select the user's billing role to facilitate the distinction between operational and business roles. Make sure you have the same number of operational and business users as in your contract.

You can also indicate if the user is external to the organization. External users are mostly partner organization members. Partner users are excluded from the billing process.

content_parts.title: Create customers and suppliers from the Item page

content_parts.content: To improve efficiency, you can add and edit supplier and customer information directly from the Item page.

The authorizations for a group of packages include the following improvements for accuracy and reduced implementation and maintenance time:

  • Updated permission text
  • Grouped permissions
  • Automatic reference lookup management
  • Standard roles updated
  • Menu item visibility corresponds to the user's rights

The following packages are included:

  • Scheduler
  • Dashboard
  • Import/Export
  • Synchronization
  • System
  • Communication
  • Customization
  • Reporting

You can manage attachments from queries using the Attachment activity under the Upload package.

content_parts.title: Purchase order planning and Work order planning notifications

content_parts.content:
To let you know that the task is finished, a notification displays in the notification center:

  • When an MRP calculation request is completed, from the notification you can go to the Purchase order planning and Work order planning pages.
    The Work order planning page displays the work order category and type as optional, filterable columns on the main list.
  • When Purchase order planning or Work order planning has created the orders, from the notification you can go to a filtered list of the created orders in the main list on the Purchase order or Work order page.

You can indicate that a work order category ID is the default category to apply to new work orders. If selected, the default category is also applied to a work order created as a make-to-order (MTO) to meet a demand order such as a confirmed sales order.

content_parts.title: Stock valuation remains in progress and prevents running the valuation

content_parts.content: When the Authorization service option is active and you have item-site valuation permission, the status is no longer blocked at In progress and you can run the valuation.

content_parts.content:
The current stock receipt import template, StockReceipt, was renamed to StockReceiptExport and set to export only.
A new stock receipt import template, StockReceipt, was created without the stock transaction node.

content_parts.content:
The task dimension simplifies capturing task data for projects when you enter transactions. A task needs to be linked to a unique project, but a project can have multiple tasks.

If you integrate with Sage Intacct, you can create, update, and delete tasks when you synchronize.

Landed costs functionality is available for purchase orders so that costs can be processed before goods are received. The respective landed cost accrual and cost adjustment journal entries are automatically generated.

content_parts.content:
On the Defaults tab, these options simplify how you synchronize contacts:

Reset contact list: You can overwrite customer and supplier records in Sage Intacct with your Sage DMO records.

Contact list category name: You can apply predefined category names to the Sage Intacct customer and supplier contact lists.

Exclude display contact from the contact list: This setting matches the Exclude from company contact list checkbox in Sage Intacct. It prevents a duplicate contact from displaying with the nested primary contact.
